text: The UK R&B; Chart is a weekly chart that ranks the 40 biggest-selling singles and albums that are classified in the R&B; genre in the United Kingdom. The chart is compiled by the Official Charts Company, and is based on physical and other physical formats. This is a list of the UK's biggest R&B; hits of 1996.The R&B; Singles Archive 1996 ==Number ones== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="font-size:90%;" |+Key |bgcolor=#FFFF99 align=center|
